## ToolboxCategory.createRowContentsContainer\_() method

Creates the container for the label and icon. This is necessary so we can set all subcategory pointer events to none.  The div that holds the icon and the label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected createRowContentsContainer_(): HTMLDivElement;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLDivElement
